overview: Live documentation from the 4th Flammenzauber Festival in 2004 at the Wasserburg in Heldrungen. The video-recordings were made by 3 TV-cameras and the sound was directly recorded from the mixing-desk. Each performance begins with a short graphic intro, and closes with performer credits.  Mercydesign // Echo West // Axon Neuron/Vagwa // Waldteufel // Ostara // In Gowan Ring // Changes
title: Filmwerk Flammenzauber
